events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit me properly. The size information was confusing.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to sizing issues; classify this case under the Refund cluster.
Assigned support agent to handle the refund request for the jacket order placed recently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for the jacket. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed, so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 8745921. I have not worn or washed the jacket; it is still in perfect condition with tags attached.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed immediately.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the hassle-free return process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we did not hear back, we are closing your refund case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
